turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, Can I get a Caramel Macchiato, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what size Caramel Macchiato would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a Grande please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it. Where would you like to pick up your beverage?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the Starbucks down the street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to confirm, that the Starbucks located at 1100 Fourth Street in San Rafael, California?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, could you make it with extra whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, that's not a problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When is it going to be ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your total comes to $3.50. Would you like to proceed?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help you with anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Have a nice day.
